install.name: DOCman Category
install.author: Joomlatools
install.copyright: This extension is released under the GNU/GPL License
install.description: Shows the documents from one specific category

param.name: catid
param.label: CategoryID
param.description: Leave blank to use all categories, or enter a specific DOCman category ID here ( enter multiple categories seperated by commas ).

param.name: show_icon
param.label: Show icon
param.description: displays a generic icon near the name of the document

param.name: show_category
param.label: Show category
param.description: displays the category of the document
